verification.prompt: Given that 'Classic Travel' refers specifically to the travel company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Classic Travel Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Gabo Travels' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Gabo Travels Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Bongo Travel' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Bongo Travel Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Expo Visa Services (EVS)' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about EVS Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Sunpower Travels' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Sunpower Travels Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Acorn Prime Destination' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Acorn Prime Destination Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Hayleys Travels' refers specifically to the travel division of Hayleys in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Hayleys Travels Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Mackinnons Travels' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Mackinnons Travels Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Inqbaytor' refers specifically to the platform or service based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Inqbaytor Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Travelco Holidays' refers specifically to the company based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Travelco Holidays Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

recommendation.facebook:
Client: ##brands##
 Competitors: ##competitors## 
 Please do an analysis of ##brands## facebook posts vs. the ##competitors##, and give the ##brands## an analysis and recommendations to perform better than the ##competitors##, in point form. Note that each post had very good images and videos attached. Please make sure you include what the ##brands## did well and not-so-well, and what the ##competitors## did well and not-so-well, in the analysis, and provide the recommendations only for the ##brands##. Please return your analysis well formatted with HTML tags.

 Competitors: ##competitors##

sltDataCategorizationPrompt:
give me the aspect base sentiment for given text.the text is $text$. Valid asspects are 
News, Social, Loan Services, Digital Banking, Saving Accounts, Competition, Credit Cards, E-Banking & Mobile Banking, Youth, Fake calls, E-Banking & Mobile Banking, Youth, Fake calls.
Find the most relevant aspect from the given aspect list, for the given text.sentiment should be one of neutral,negative,positive.return the response with most suitable aspect and related sentiment as a JSON format. object key is equal to aspect and its value shoud be sentiment {relatedAspect:sentiment}.if there is no relevent aspect found for the text return null
